text:
The 1.3 build.xml generates classes, jars, javadocs, etc in lots of different
locations, which makes the cleaning up task a bit of a challenge.  All generated
files should be placed into a single, common directory which can then be deleted
for clean up.
creator: mwomack@apache.org

text:
Submitted first round of cleanup that puts almost all generated files into the
"dist" directory.  Revision 365511.
creator: mwomack@apache.org

text: Initial commit by mwomack on rev 365511
creator: carnold@apache.org
